items.title: Chelsea host Palace in Women's FA Cup fourth round
items.description: Holders Chelsea are handed a home tie against Crystal Palace in the draw for the fourth round of the Women's FA Cup.

items.title: Darts star Menzies apologies for punching table after five-set defeat
items.description: Cameron Menzies apologises after angrily punching a drinks table after his first-round loss to Charlie Manby at the PDC World Championship.

items.title: Menzies apologises for repeatedly punching table after loss
items.description: Cameron Menzies apologises after angrily punching a drinks table after his first-round loss to Charlie Manby at the PDC World Championship.

items.title: Iranian Nobel laureate taken to hospital after 'violent arrest', family says
items.description: Narges Mohammadi told her family in a phone call that she was beaten on the head and neck by plainclothes agents in Mashhad last week.

items.title: Mariah Carey to perform at Winter Olympics opening ceremony
items.description: American pop superstar Mariah Carey will perform at the opening ceremony of next year's Winter Olympics, organisers announce.
